question: Mrs Barrett, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, has advertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a day next summer.Write a letter to Mrs Barrett. In your letter:• suggest how you could help her in her home• say why you would like to do this work• explain when you will and will not be available
text: I am Sandra Adams, living on West main street near Central Park. I saw this advertisement on a Facebook Group called "Now Hiring in the city". I am really pleased to hear this advertised and I am writing this letter to let you know that I am interested in your offer.

Once, I was a housekeeper at Hilston Hotel in Branson, Missouri since I was 25 years old and Now I am 31 years old. I quit that job because I have to move to this town for following my husband who is  working at Bank Of America.
Thus, I personally think I have opportunities doing this job and I will be available 5 days a week from 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM and 15:00 PM - 18:00 PM on Monday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday
I look forward to hear from you and I hope you let me do this job
